name: Ternimal Velocity
description:
You're falling.

How did you get here?

Who are all these animals?

Why does your head hurt so much?

All of these questions will be answered, in no particular order.

Made for Ludum Dare 47 by:

  • Andrew Persic (@yung-failure) - Coding, Art
  • Ango Zhu (@infraxion, website) - Coding, Art, Music
  • Andrew Wilson (@chao) - Coding, Art

Software used:

  • Unity
  • Paint.net
  • Aseprite
  • FL Studio
  • RX
